official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that Fort Crailo in Rensselaer, New York, should be designated as the home of "Yankee Doodle".

summary.text: Recognizes Dr. Richard Shuckburgh as the primary author of the tune "Yankee Doodle" and Fort Crailo in Rensselaer, New York, as the home of Yankee Doodle.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that Fort Crailo in Rensselaer, New York, should be designated as the home of "Yankee Doodle".
